== ThreeWave Capture the Flag ==
=== Installation ===
==== Models/Textures/Sounds/Maps ====
<pre>
mkdir /<install path>/quake2/ctf
cd /<install path>/quake2/ctf
wget ftp://ftp.idsoftware.com/idstuff/quake2/ctf/q2ctf150.zip
wget ftp://ftp.idsoftware.com/idstuff/quake2/ctf/q2ctf150upgrade.zip
unzip q2ctf150.zip
unzip q2ctf150upgrade.zip
</pre>

==== Binaries ====
<pre>
cd /<install path>/quake2/ctf
wget ftp://ftp.idsoftware.com/idstuff/quake2/ctf/unix/q2ctf150-glibc-i386-unknown-linux.tar.gz
tar -xvzf q2ctf150-glibc-i386-unknown-linux.tar.gz
</pre>

==== md5sum ====
<pre>
81eaf1e6c9d51ca559c229585e377520  ctf/gamei386.so
1f6bd3d4c08f7ed8c037b12fcffd2eb5  ctf/pak0.pak
ecd7734ba0c2c6087e8f5beaeac359a4  ctf/pak1.pak
</pre>

=== Playing ===
<pre>
./quake2_ +set game ctf
</pre>
